title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2040.11 - Agency retention of records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 2040.11 - Agency retention of records

State Regulations

The division shall retain records of noncompliance or
failure to certify for six years beyond the agency's filing of the respective
IRS form 8823. In other cases the division must retain the certifications and
records described in sections
2040.7
and
2040.8
of this Part for three years
from the end of the calendar year the division receives the certified
records. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
2040.11

Amended

New

York State Register May 26, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 21, eff. 5/26/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
